segments.text: Currently we are looking for business opportunities in northeast China .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of business do you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We send analysts to companies that run into financial difficulties .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of clients do you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Smaller local companies . We specialize in trade & shipping industry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to work for a shipping company for six years , and I am quite familiar with some managers . Would your like to meet them ?
segments.speaker: S2
